modName: Main Menu Replacer - Large Centered Logo
summary: This mod changes the main menu so that the Skyrim logo is big and centered.
descriptionHtml:
[heading]Description[/heading]
This mod changes the main menu so that the Skyrim logo is very large and centered. I wanted to make the logo [b]BIG[/b] and [b]BOLD[/b]. I made this for 1920x1080 resolution, but it looks similar on other resolutions also - check the screenshots. Note that the thumbnails cut off the bottoms of the low-res screenshots, but you can click on them to see the full images.

Alternatively, I also included a file that removes the logo altogether.

In one of the screenshots, I used one of Hectrol's retextures that you can download here: http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=154

[heading]Credits[/heading]
Thanks to God for saving me.
Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim.
Thanks to the Nexus for file hosting and fostering a great modding community.
Thanks to the NifTools team for great tools.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks ChrisFiftyTwo for suggesting a no logo version.

[heading]Tools Used[/heading]
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp
author: Documn
